title: manga character with a few similarities with draven
body:
while reading a manga i noticed one of the characters similar to draven
dunno if it's just me but
1. hair standing up
2. head band? or whatever you call them
3. moustache/goatee
4. fights with dual axes (different shape but they both 'axes')
5. similar personality 

maybe i have been playing lol too much

replies.body: It's drawn by Korean not Japanese though, so normally we call it Manhwa (name shared with Chinese comics) instead of Manga.

> [{quoted}](name=SEKAI,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=4NXpLrHu,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-09-04T11:58:44.339+0000)
>
> It's drawn by Korean not Japanese though, so normally we call it Manhwa (name shared with Chinese comics) instead of Manga.

it's from vinland saga, which is made by a japanese guy

> [{quoted}](name=Infected Walnut,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=4NXpLrHu,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-09-04T12:36:22.312+0000)
>
> it's from vinland saga, which is made by a japanese guy

Oh my bad, I simply saw the words on the bottom right which are written in Korean for some reason and thought this is taken out from a manhwa.

I haven't read Vinland Saga after all, at least not yet.

Apology for the mistake.

__________

But yer imagine our Draven is this buffed.
Nice find! i can see the resemblance haha
